subject: failed assumption reports as passed instead of ignored
msgSnippet: Hi! I read from the documentation that failed assumptions should be reported as ignored test cases but when I m trying to use them my test cases are passed
messageBody:
Hi!
I read from the documentation that failed assumptions should be reported as ignored test cases but when I'm trying to use them my test cases are passed though failed assumptions.

In what way should they behave?
In junit code it's stated as they should pass which I think is incorrect.
See Result.java:testAssumptionFailure.

Could anyone clarify on this please.
/Stefan

additional note, I've read some posts that assumptions work
in my expected way when used in beforeclass. But all doc says
that it should be usable on individual test cases too.
